text: The 2016–17 Premier Arena Soccer League season consists of 30 teams grouped into 6 divisions across the US. The Premier Arena Soccer League continues to serve as the developmental league to the Major Arena Soccer League. ==Men's standings== As of March 27, 2017. 6 |Arizona Fire |8 |0-8 |.000 |0 |} ==2016-17 PASL Finals== The finals were played at the Arizona Sports Complex in Glendale, Arizona on March 18–19, 2017.
